Name: Celestial Purge
Story Background: In a time of great darkness, the clerics of the Celestial Order unleashed their most potent purification magic to cleanse the land of corruption and evil.
Ability: Exile target black or red permanent.
Appearance Description: The art depicts a radiant, golden light bursting forth from the hands of a robed cleric, engulfing a shadowy demon in purifying energy.
